insert into letter values (#{letterNo}, #{userNo}, sysdate , #{openDay}, #{bgmSrc}, #{readYN}, #{saveYN})
mapper.update: UPDATE letter SET readYN = 'YES' where letterNo = #{letterNo} and readYN = 'NO'
mapper.select: select letterNo, userNo, to_char(regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate, to_char(openDay, 'yyyy-mm-dd') openDay, bgmSrc, readYN, saveYN from letter where letterNo = #{letterNo}

select li.letterSticNo, li.letterNo, li.sticNo, li.stickerSrc, li.top, li.left, li.letterPointX, li.letterPointY, li.angle, li.text, s.stickerCateNo from letterItem li, sticker s where li.sticNo = s.stickerNo and letterNo = #{letterNo}

select lt.letterNo, lt.userNo, to_char(lt.regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate, to_char(lt.openDay, 'yyyy-mm-dd') openDay, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(openDay, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(sysdate) dDay, lt.bgmSrc, lt.readYN, lt.saveYN, st.letterSticNo, st.letterNo, st.sticNo, st.text, st.top, st.left, st.letterPointX, st.letterPointY, st.angle from (select letterNo, userNo, regDate, openDay, bgmSrc, readYN, saveYN from letter where saveYN = 'YES') lt, (select lit.letterSticNo, lit.letterNo, lit.sticNo, lit.text, lit.top, lit.left, lit.letterPointX, lit.letterPointY, lit.angle from letterItem lit, (select letterNo, min(letterSticNo) letterSticNo from letterItem where sticno = 0 group by letterNo) mnt where lit.letterSticNo = mnt.letterSticNo) st where lt.letterNo=st.letterNo(+) order by readyn asc, openday asc

select lt.letterNo, lt.userNo, to_char(lt.regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate, to_char(lt.openDay, 'yyyy-mm-dd') openDay, lt.bgmSrc, lt.readYN, lt.saveYN, st.letterSticNo, st.letterNo, st.sticNo, st.text, st.top, st.left, st.letterPointX, st.letterPointY, st.angle from (select letterNo, userNo, regDate, openDay, bgmSrc, readYN, saveYN from letter where saveYN = 'NO') lt, (select lit.letterSticNo, lit.letterNo, lit.sticNo, lit.text, lit.top, lit.left, lit.letterPointX, lit.letterPointY, lit.angle from letterItem lit, (select letterNo, min(letterSticNo) letterSticNo from letterItem where sticno = 0 group by letterNo) mnt where lit.letterSticNo = mnt.letterSticNo) st where lt.letterNo=st.letterNo(+) order by regdate desc
